text: Jozef Vengloš (18 February 1936 - 26 January 2021) was a Slovak football player. He played for Slovan Bratislava. He died on 26 January 2021 in Bratislava, aged 84.Jozef Venglos dead at 84 as former Celtic manager who signed Lubomir Moravcik passes away ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Slovak footballers Category:Slovak football managers Category:Fenerbahçe football managers Category:Czechoslovakia at UEFA Euro 1980 Category:Czechoslovakia at the 1982 FIFA World Cup Category:Czechoslovakia at the 1990 FIFA World Cup
title: Jozef Vengloš
